subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Dave Duerson’s son Tregg sued the N.F.L. on Thursday, contending that its handling of his father’s concussions led to his brain damage and ultimate suicide.
snippet: Dave Duerson’s son Tregg sued the N.F.L. on Thursday, contending that its handling of his father’s concussions led to his brain damage and ultimate suicide.
